other_tests.findings: Atrophic epidermis, vacuolar degeneration of basal layer, mild perivascular inflammatory infiltrate, and mucine deposits. Direct immunofluorescence was positive.
Numerous large, pale cells in an acanthotic epidermis, with a modest lymphohistiocytic infiltrate in the superficial dermis, and cells positive for CAM5.2 by immunohistochemical staining.
